dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A woman in Kostanay just turned in a PPSh submachine gun from 1941, can you believe that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A woman in Kostanay just turned in a PPSh submachine gun from nineteen forty one, can you believe that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A resident of Kostanay has turned in a 1941-model submachine gun to local police, citing Alau. Police said the gun was brought in by a woman who previously lived in Arkalyk.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, the Shpagin, right? The one you always see in World War Two movies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, the Shpagin, right? The one you always see in World War Two movies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "One of the first weapons handed over to the Kostanay police department was a PPSh " a Shpagin submachine gun known from films about the Great Patriotic War.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it was just sitting in a barn in Arkalyk, apparently. Her husband found it and they kept it until he passed away.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it was just sitting in a barn in Arkalyk, apparently. Her husband found it and they kept it until he passed away.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to her, the weapon was found by her husband in a barn and kept in the family until his death.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's uh, that's quite the family heirloom to just hand over to the police.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's uh, that's quite the family heirloom to just hand over to the police.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but it's part of this new campaign they're running across Kazakhstan to collect unregistered firearms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but it's part of this new campaign they're running across Kazakhstan to collect unregistered firearms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the outlet, the Kostanay region, along with the rest of the country, has launched a campaign to collect unregistered firearms and ammunition from the public.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it sounds like it's working—they got five guns on just the first day in Kostanay alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it sounds like it's working-they got five guns on just the first day in Kostanay alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the first day of the campaign alone, five firearms were handed over to police in Kostanay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Three smoothbores, two rifled, including that PPSh and a hunting rifle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Three smoothbores, two rifled, including that PPSh and a hunting rifle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Three of them were smoothbore guns, two were rifled, including the PPSh and a commercial hunting rifle.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They mentioned the government allocated more funds for it this year too, right? Like, more than previous buyback programs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They mentioned the government allocated more funds for it this year too, right? Like, more than previous buyback programs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year, police said, the government has allocated more funds for the initiative than in previous years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhmm. And it's not just guns—earlier in February, someone found a Red Army military flask in Mangystau.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhmm. And it's not just guns-earlier in February, someone found a Red Army military flask in Mangystau.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier in February, an Aktau resident and amateur paleontologist, Vladimir Yartsev, discovered a military flask from the Red Army era in Mangystau.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild what's still out there, just tucked away in sheds and barns after all these decades.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild what's still out there, just tucked away in sheds and barns after all these decades.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. I mean, how do you just forget you have a submachine gun?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. I mean, how do you just forget you have a submachine gun?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But you know, in some places, these things get passed down without much thought until a program like this comes along.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But you know, in some places, these things get passed down without much thought until a program like this comes along.
